intro: Psychotria mauiensis, commonly known as Maui's Psychotria, is a flowering plant native to the Hawaiian Islands. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It thrives in moist, shaded environments, typically found in the understory of Hawaiian rainforests. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and endangered species.
